auth.tooManyAttempts: Too many failed login attempts. Try again later
auth.passwordFieldsRequired: Current password and new password are required
auth.passwordMinLength: New password must be at least 10 characters
auth.passwordComplexity: New password must include uppercase, lowercase, and a number
auth.passwordMustDiffer: New password must be different from current password

slot.nameAndDatesRequired: Slot name, start time, and end time are required
slot.datesRequired: Start and end time are required
slot.endAfterStart: End time must be after start time

appointment.fieldsRequired: Slot, name, start time, and end time are required
appointment.slotNotAllowedForLink: Selected slot is not available for this booking link
appointment.endAfterStart: Appointment end time must be after start time
appointment.outsideSlot: Appointment must be within the selected availability slot
appointment.overlap: Selected time range overlaps with another appointment
appointment.loadError: Appointment could not be loaded after creation
appointment.deleteOnlyPastOrCanceled: Only past or canceled appointments can be deleted

link.slotSelectionRequired: At least one slot must be selected

cancelPage.successMessage: Your appointment has been successfully canceled.
cancelPage.failDefault: The operation could not be completed
